about_the_game:
Please read about the contents before purchasing!
Thank you very much for your support♥

***
Installation:
After installed, the DLC will be downloaded in your local folder.
Check the game library, right click "Trick & Treat", click "properties" and find the "local files".

***
This Art Book is something extra for those who enjoy the little game and would like to support the dev/artist.
It includes pixel maps and drawings in the Remake version,
and the doodles in during the five years (most of them were posted on the devblogs and the website).

It is an A4 sized ebook (a pdf file) with about 50 pages (25 double pages).
In this art book you will find:

- Remade maps and other art
- Doodles and sketches during 2016-2021


*Notice*
Please do not repost any part of the content without permission.
